title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: FARMER ASKED ABOUT WEATHER FORECAST OF KHAMGAON BLOCK  ?
records.KccAns: WEATHER FORECAST OF KHAMGAON BLOCK  =  THIS WEEK WEATHER IS CLOUDY AND    POSSIBILITY OF MEDIUM RAINFALL .TEMPERATURE  -MINIMUM .22 DEGREE CELCIUS  AND MAXIMUM  32   DEGREE CELCIUS AND WIND SPEED 18  KM/HOUR.

records.KccAns: Kisan bhai, wait till you get the amount for the pradhan mantri kisan samman nidhi yojna.

records.QueryText: Farmer Asked About Market Rate of Soyabean crop?
records.KccAns: Market Rate of Soyabean crop:- Lasalgaon Market = Minimum- 3199 Rs/qtl , Maximum- 3606 Rs/qtl , Average- 3560 Rs/qtl.

records.QueryText: WEED MANAGEMENT IN COTTON
records.KccAns: RECOMMENDED TO SPRAY PYRITHIOBAC SODIUM 250 ML + QUIZALOFOP-P-ETHYL 400 ML /200 LITRES OF WATER PER ACRE

records.QueryText: Farmer needs information regarding control measures of termite in mentha crop?
records.KccAns: recommended dose of chloropyriphos 20 EC 1 liter mixed in 8-10 kg of sand and broad cast in 1 acre for  control termite in mentha crop.

records.QueryText: ASKING ABOUT PM KISAN MAN DHAN YOJANA
records.KccAns:
TOLD HIM THAT RS.3000 WILL BE GIVEN TO THE FARMER WHO ATTAINS AGE OF 60 YEARS. THE LAND HOLDING SHOULD BE BELOW 15 BIGHA. THE FARMER SHOULD BE OF AGE 18-40 YEARS OLD. A CONTRIBUTION HAS TO BE GIVEN PER MONTH VARYING FROM AMOUNT RS.55 TO RS.200 DEPENDING UPON THE AGE. THE REGISTRATION IS FREE AND HAS TO BE DONE IN COMMON SERVICE CENTERS OF THEIR RESPECTIVE BLOCK. DOCUMENTS THAT HAVE TO BE CARRIED ARE AADHAAR CARD, BANK PASSBOOK, LAND DETAILS. FOR FURTHER DETAILS CONTACT VLE OF COMMON SERVICE CENTER.
MD INAMUL ALI	Vill.: Kamarkuchi, GP : 44(3) Barbhag, Block : Barbhag, P.O. : Kamarkuchi, Dist. : Nalbari, ASSAM -	9859891739

records.QueryText: Information about in sowing time mustard?
records.KccAns: Sir ap dhaan ke khet me Carbofuran 3G,8 kilogram prati acre ki dar se bikher kar prayog kare.

records.QueryText: Tiller dose in paddy
records.KccAns: Tiller dose in paddy - Advised to apply 15 kg Gromor + 15 kg Urea + 12 kg MOP/acre

records.QueryText: Government scheme related query
records.KccAns: Email on dbtcellagri2@gmail.com

records.QueryText: PM KISAN SAMMAN NIDHI YOJANA
records.KccAns: For information under PM KISAN SAMMAN NIDHI YOJANA  , contact Bihar Kisan Call Center

records.QueryText: ASKING ABOUT WEATHER REPORT IN NARAYANGARH BLOCK.
records.KccAns: RECOMMENDED FOR SPRAY GRADE 2  @  2-3 GM/ML / LIT OF WATER.

records.QueryText: Farmer asked about attack of caterpillar on Cotton ?
records.KccAns: for controlling attack of Caterpillar in Cotton  crop spray emamectin benzoate  8 gram per 15 litre of water

records.QueryText: Farmer want to know information about control measure Thrips insect in Blank Gram crop?
records.KccAns: You can apply Lambda Cyhalothrin 5% EC @ 150 ml/acre mix with 150-200 liter of water for control measure Thrips insect in Blank Gram crop.

records.QueryText: Information regarding control of stem borer and leaf folder in Basmati paddy ?
records.KccAns: For control of sheath blight in paddy spray 200 ml Tilt/Bumper (Propiconazole 25 EC) or 200 ml Amistar Top 325 SC (Azoxystrobin+Difenoconazole) or 80 gram Nativo 75 WG (Tebuconazole+Trifloxystrobin) or 200 ml Folicur/Orius 25 EC (Tebuconazole) or 320 ml Lusture (Flusilazole+Carbendazim) or 200 ml Moncerem 250 SC (Pencycuron) or 200 gram Bavistin 50 WP (Carbendazim) in 200 liters of water per acre.

records.QueryText: Asked about PM Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana
records.KccAns: Suggested to contact  raitha samparka kendra or kvk  agriculture department or horticulture department, forest department or nationalized banks or cooperative banks

records.QueryText: Information regarding control of fruit fly in fruits?
records.KccAns: Control of fruit fly in fruits Spray 2.5 ml Sumicidin 20EC (fenvalerate) in 1 liter of water at weekly intervals on ripening fruits and Fix PAU fruit fly traps @1 traps in the second week of July.

records.QueryText: Farmer need information regarding weather for Khairagarh Block in Rajnandgaon District of Chhattisgarh State?
records.KccAns: This Scheme is provide by Central Government, under this scheme Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maan-Dhan (PM-SYM) Yojana. Farmers, who fall under the age of 18 to 40 years can avail this scheme. The premium rate will be 55-200 Rs. per month for the farmers whose age in between 18 and 60 years . The amount of Rs. 3000 per month will be provided as the pension after the completion of 60 year. For Registration on this scheme farmer can contact to the nearly situated Choice centres.
